SEARCH
Package com.dua3.meja.ui

Class SegmentViewDelegate

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.ui.SegmentViewDelegate
public class SegmentViewDelegate extends Object
This class serves as a delegate for the SegmentView and is responsible for managing its visualization, layout calculations, and interactions with the associated SheetViewDelegate. It provides methods to retrieve and manipulate the segment view's spatial characteristics, such as dimensions, offsets, and positions, and ensures proper layout updates in the context of the sheet view.

The SegmentViewDelegate class makes it possible to share code between the swing and JavaFX implementations.

    • SegmentViewDelegate

      public SegmentViewDelegate(SegmentView owner, SheetViewDelegate sheetViewDelegate, SheetView.Quadrant quadrant)
      Constructs a SegmentViewDelegate instance, which manages the interaction between a SegmentView, a SheetViewDelegate, and a specific SheetView.Quadrant.
      Parameters:
      owner - the SegmentView instance associated with this delegate
      sheetViewDelegate - the SheetViewDelegate managing the sheet's layout and data
      quadrant - the SheetView.Quadrant defining the portion of the sheet displayed by the segment

    • isLeftOfSplit

      public boolean isLeftOfSplit()
      Determines whether the segment view is located to the left of a split column in the associated sheet.
      Returns:
      true if the segment view is to the left of the split column, or if the sheet is not present and the start column index is less than or equal to 0; otherwise, false

    • isAboveSplit

      public boolean isAboveSplit()
      Determines if the segment view is positioned above the split row in the sheet.
      Returns:
      true if the end row of the segment view is less than or equal to the split row of the sheet; if the sheet is not present, returns true if the starting row index is less than or equal to zero.

    • hasHLine

      public boolean hasHLine()
      Determines whether the segment view contains a horizontal line.
      Returns:
      true if the sheet's split row is greater than zero and the end row is less than or equal to the split row, or if the start row is less than or equal to zero when the sheet is not present. Otherwise, returns false.

    • hasVLine

      public boolean hasVLine()
      Determines if the segment view intersects with a vertical split line in the sheet.
      Returns:
      true if there is a vertical split line within the bounds of this segment view, false otherwise.

    • updateLayout

      public void updateLayout()
      Updates the layout of the segment view based on the current sheet view settings. This includes recalculating the dimensions of the visible area in points and pixels and adjusting offsets for column and row labels depending on the split configuration.

      The method first secures a read lock on the sheet to ensure thread safety while it performs the following steps:

      • Invokes the updateLayout() method on the sheetViewDelegate to ensure the sheet layout is current.
      • Calculates the total width of the visible area, including optional margins for row labels and split lines.
      • Calculates the total height of the visible area, similarly including margins for column labels and split lines.
      • Determines the horizontal and vertical offsets based on the starting positions of columns and rows relative to splits.
      • Converts the calculated width and height into pixels using the current scaling factors.
      • Sets the display size in the owner view to the newly calculated pixel dimensions.
      The method is designed to handle various display configurations, including different split views where segments might be positioned above, below, left, or right of splits.

    • getStartColumn

      public int getStartColumn()
      Get the index of the first row to display. This might return a row index smaller than the index of the first row contained in the sheet.
      Returns:
      row index

    • getStartRow

      public int getStartRow()
      Gets the starting row index for the segment view.
      Returns:
      the starting row index for the quadrant

    • getEndColumn

      public int getEndColumn()
      Retrieves the end column index for the segment view.
      Returns:
      The end column index (exclusive)

    • getEndRow

      public int getEndRow()
      Get the index of the last row to display based on the quadrant's end row logic.
      Returns:
      the index of the last row to display, taking into account the total number of rows and the split row value.

    • getTransformation

      public com.dua3.utility.math.geometry.AffineTransformation2f getTransformation()
      Combines the translation transformation based on the x and y offsets and the existing transformation provided by the sheet view delegate.
      Returns:
      an AffineTransformation2f object representing the combined transformation.

    • getQuadrant

      public SheetView.Quadrant getQuadrant()
      Retrieves the quadrant associated with this segment view delegate.
      Returns:
      the SheetView.Quadrant representing the portion of the sheet managed by this delegate
